name: Infection (v0.0.3)
description:
THIS IS A DEMO. THE GAME IS NOT YET FINISHED AND IS IN EARLY ACCESS.

Infection is a in-development multiplayer horror game. The story?

A lab full of scientists were testing a new substance on some participants who were willing to try it. But the substance had some errors, which caused the participants to be infected. Now they're spreading it all over town, and you, a normal person who is hiding in the lab, must now navigate your way out, as the infected have closed all exits! Can you survive?

FOLLOW ME ON SCRATCH: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/Soupeye/

FRIEND ME ON STEAM: https://steamcommunity.com/id/soupeye

GET UPDATED ON THE PROJECT BY FOLLOWING THE STUDIO TOO:  https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/28672538/projects/

Don't forget to leave feedback after you play! It helps us improve the game more and more!

Credit to Scratch, the Infection team, FNAF, And all my supporters/fans on Scratch!

To play the game, first download it, then create a scratch account, make a new project, and click load file. Then open this up!
